response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $10,000 for it. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to acquire this high-quality item at a price that's slightly above its intrinsic value but still offers significant savings compared to market rates. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10000}
